languages.text: Ирлиэт Ланэвисс разочаровалась в собратьях, следующих, словно покорное стадо, за ослепленными провидцами. Некоторое время она сопровождала Вольного Торговца, однако бытие среди мон-кай открыло ей, что среди слабых душой и волей людей, как и среди детей Азуриана, для Ирлиэт нет места.

Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her kin who had followed the blind Farseers like obedient cattle. She accompanied the Rogue Trader for a time, but her time among the mon-keigh only made her feel more alone, revealing to her that humans were as bereft of strong spirit and will as the Children of Asuryan.
languages.original_text: Ирлиэт Ланэвисс разочаровалась в собратьях, следующих, словно покорное стадо, за ослепленными провидцами. Некоторое время она сопровождала Вольного Торговца, однако бытие среди мон-кай открыло ей, что среди слабых душой и волей людей, как и среди детей Азуриана, для Ирлиэт нет места.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her brethren that followed blinded Farseers like obedient cattle. For some time she accompanied the Rogue Trader, but the time spent with mon-keigh opened her eyes to the fact that there was no place for her among weak in spirit and will humans, just as among the Children of Asuryan.

Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her brethren that followed blinded Farseers like obedient cattle. For some time she accompanied the Rogue Trader, but the time spent with mon-keigh opened her eyes to the fact that there was no place for her among weak in spirit and will humans, just as among the Children of Asuryan.

Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her kins who followed blind Farseers like obedient cattle. She accompanied the Rogue Trader for a time, but her time among mon-keigh only made her feel more alone, revealing to her that humans were as bereft of strong spirit and will as the Children of Asuryan.

Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her kin who had followed the blind Farseers like obedient cattle. She accompanied the Rogue Trader for a time, but her time among the mon-keigh only made her feel more alone, revealing to her that humans were as bereft of strong spirit and will as the Children of Asuryan.

Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her kin who had followed the blind Farseers like obedient cattle. She accompanied the Rogue Trader for a time, but her time among the mon-keigh only made her feel more alone, revealing to her that humans were as bereft of strong spirit and will as the Children of Asuryan.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝目睹了族人像顺从的牲畜一样盲从短视的先知之后，对他们失去了信心。她陪伴了行商浪人一段时间，但在猴子之中度过的时光只让她感到更加孤独。她意识到，人类与阿苏焉之子一样，同样缺乏强大的精神于意志。
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her kin who had followed the blind Farseers like obedient cattle. She accompanied the Rogue Trader for a time, but her time among the mon-keigh only made her feel more alone, revealing to her that humans were as bereft of strong spirit and will as the Children of Asuryan.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝目睹了族人像顺从的牲畜一样盲从短视的先知之后，对他们失去了信心。她陪伴了行商浪人一段时间，但在猴子之中度过的时光只让她感到更加孤独。她意识到，人类与阿苏焉之子一样，同样缺乏强大的精神于意志。

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss verlor den Glauben an ihre Verwandten, die blinden Runenpropheten folgten wie gefügiges Vieh. Sie begleitete {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} eine Weile lang, doch ihre Zeit unter den Chem-Pan-Sey sorgte nur dafür, dass sie sich noch einsamer fühlte. Ihr wurde vor Augen geführt, dass die Menschen ebenso wenig über einen starken Geist und Willen verfügten wie die Kinder von Asuryan.
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her kin who had followed the blind Farseers like obedient cattle. She accompanied the Rogue Trader for a time, but her time among the mon-keigh only made her feel more alone, revealing to her that humans were as bereft of strong spirit and will as the Children of Asuryan.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss verlor den Glauben an ihre Verwandten, die blinden Runenpropheten folgten wie gefügiges Vieh. Sie begleitete {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} eine Weile lang, doch ihre Zeit unter den Chem-Pan-Sey sorgte nur dafür, dass sie sich noch einsamer fühlte. Ihr wurde vor Augen geführt, dass die Menschen ebenso wenig über einen starken Geist und Willen verfügten wie die Kinder von Asuryan.

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss perdit foi en ses semblables qui suivaient les Grands Prophètes comme du bétail docile. Elle voyagea pendant un temps aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, mais elle se sentit plus seule que jamais parmi les mon-keigh et réalisa que les humains manquaient autant de volonté que les enfants d'Asuryan.
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her kin who had followed the blind Farseers like obedient cattle. She accompanied the Rogue Trader for a time, but her time among the mon-keigh only made her feel more alone, revealing to her that humans were as bereft of strong spirit and will as the Children of Asuryan.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss perdit foi en ses semblables qui suivaient les Grands Prophètes comme du bétail docile. Elle voyagea pendant un temps aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, mais elle se sentit plus seule que jamais parmi les mon-keigh et réalisa que les humains manquaient autant de volonté que les enfants d'Asuryan.

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss perdió la fe en sus hermanos, que seguían ciegamente a los videntes como borregos. Acompañó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente durante un tiempo, pero estar rodeada de mon-keigh solo acentuó su soledad: descubrió que los humanos estaban tan carentes de espíritu y voluntad propios como los hijos de Asuryan.
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her kin who had followed the blind Farseers like obedient cattle. She accompanied the Rogue Trader for a time, but her time among the mon-keigh only made her feel more alone, revealing to her that humans were as bereft of strong spirit and will as the Children of Asuryan.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss perdió la fe en sus hermanos, que seguían ciegamente a los videntes como borregos. Acompañó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente durante un tiempo, pero estar rodeada de mon-keigh solo acentuó su soledad: descubrió que los humanos estaban tan carentes de espíritu y voluntad propios como los hijos de Asuryan.

languages.text: ユリエット・ラナエフィスは、盲目の先見司に従順な家畜のように従う一族に対する信頼を失った。しばらくの間、彼女は自由開拓者に同行したが、モン＝ケイの間で過ごした時間が彼女の孤独感を募らせ、人間がアシュリアンの御子たちと同じように強い精神と意志を持たない存在であることを思しることとなった。
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her kin who had followed the blind Farseers like obedient cattle. She accompanied the Rogue Trader for a time, but her time among the mon-keigh only made her feel more alone, revealing to her that humans were as bereft of strong spirit and will as the Children of Asuryan.

traits.locale_text: ユリエット・ラナエフィスは、盲目の先見司に従順な家畜のように従う一族に対する信頼を失った。しばらくの間、彼女は自由開拓者に同行したが、モン＝ケイの間で過ごした時間が彼女の孤独感を募らせ、人間がアシュリアンの御子たちと同じように強い精神と意志を持たない存在であることを思しることとなった。

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss, kör Ötesezenleri itaatkâr sürü hayvanları gibi takip eden soydaşlarına dair inancını yitirdi. Bir süre Hür Tacir'e eşlik etti ancak mon-keighler arasındaki yaşamı ona kendini daha da yalnız hissettirdi, ruh ve irade açısından insanların da Asuryan'ın Çocukları kadar zayıf olabileceğini gösterdi.
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss lost faith in her kin who had followed the blind Farseers like obedient cattle. She accompanied the Rogue Trader for a time, but her time among the mon-keigh only made her feel more alone, revealing to her that humans were as bereft of strong spirit and will as the Children of Asuryan.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss, kör Ötesezenleri itaatkâr sürü hayvanları gibi takip eden soydaşlarına dair inancını yitirdi. Bir süre Hür Tacir'e eşlik etti ancak mon-keighler arasındaki yaşamı ona kendini daha da yalnız hissettirdi ve ruhani açıdan ve irade açısından insanların da Asuryan'ın Çocukları kadar zayıf olabileceğini gösterdi.
